channel.title: Recreation on The Median Data Scientist
channel.description: Recent content in Recreation on The Median Data Scientist

item.title: Quick meme making in R
item.description:
Source: Create Bart Simpson Blackboard Memes with R bart <- "bart_simpson_chalkboard-5157.gif" # source: http://free-extras.com/images/bart_simpson_chalkboard-5157.htm text <- paste(rep("I will not procrastinate 
 in grant writing 
 by making memes in R instead", 2), collapse = "
") meme(bart, text, size = 2, font = "Comic")
